name: Android App Development
description: Android is the great mobile operating system which offered by search engine giant Google Inc. its based on Open Source Technology, Android software stack are integrated with lots of technologies supporting programming languages such as C, C++, Java, XML etc. Moreover, android system supports numerous industry specific applications, as well as high end entertainment application for individual, business and corporates. With release in 2008, android mobile devices are become the fans favorite & along with its huge supports of numerous applications, We are working with android app from 2010 till now here in Bangladesh.
title1: DCIT ltd. as an Android App Development Company in Bangladesh
p1:
As a renowned name in Website Design and Development, also software industry based in Dhaka Bangladesh, NIBiz Soft is very prominent as a software development comapny and also remarkable on various Mobile Application Development, Open Source Software and Microsoft technologies. As an android app development company in bangladesh Over 10 years of experience, along with skilled development team of professional mobile app developers we have satisfied our each clients and every requirement of Android App Development. We understand the requirement of each and every android mobile application development project is unique, including other application development. We perform a good study of your android development requirement and make a scope of analysis which can give you the crystal clear image of your project starting from beginning to ending. This will also help you or client to justify the timeframe or deadline to develop the application, pricing structure as well as how your project will affect your targeted market.
This strategy will allows us to deliver you comprehended solutions to meet the exact expectation of our clients. Whether there is a requirement of multi-platform application like iPhone , Android or Windows Phone or a dedicated application, our android development team will design the best solution for you always. Our android app development team is skilled on the latest Android SDK provide by Google to give you the utmost solutions in android development.
